text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi @realDonaldTrump  You're great at giving away stuff you don't own and didn't pay for. How about selling the stuff at cost and saving US taxpayers a little money? Maybe you should give ventilators to American Indian nations that have Covid-19 problems. What a hollow-headed schmuck
